title: Train Sim World® 4 Compatible: NEC: New York - Trenton
description: Experience the City that never sleeps. From the Big Apple to New Jersey suburbs, non-stop action awaits aboard premier electric traction. Serve the East Coast well with NJ TRANSIT and Amtrak® passenger equipment.
longDescription:
**TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.**

Experience the City that never sleeps. From the Big Apple to New Jersey suburbs, non-stop action awaits aboard premier electric traction. Serve the East Coast well with NJ TRANSIT and Amtrak® passenger equipment, brought to life in Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: New York - Trenton.

Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Super Bundle!

Get to work on dense passenger operations aboard the iconic NJ TRANSIT ALP-46. All-modern, all-powerful, the ALP-46 is derived from its European cousin, the BR 101. Twinned with capacity-crunching Multilevel equipment, hurry commuters by the hundreds between Trenton and New York Penn Station from the workhorse itself or the striking cab car.

Go the distance in speed and style. Between the heart of all-stopper action, take charge and race through on express Amtrak services, powered by the stalwart ACS-64, also a relative of European motive power. Sprint between cities with Amfleets in-tow and get a taste of retro tech from the cosy confines of the ex-metroliner cab car, push becomes shove with 8600 hp on your tail!

Follow in the footsteps of railroad legends, the famed Northeast Corridor is rich in history and complexity dating back more than a Century. Now busier than ever, link the likes of Trenton Transit Center and Newark Liberty International to the most populous city in the United States. Whether riding express, or getting into the commuter flow, take on the challenge of all-hours action on America’s East Coast.

Ride and Operate commuter trains out of bustling New York City, complete route tasks, or simply go railfanning from your favorite vantage point. Customize your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer and share them on Creators Club.

# Key Features 

- 58-mile (94 km) route from New York Penn to Trenton Transit Center
- NJ TRANSIT ALP-46 electric locomotive
- Amtrak ACS-64 electric locomotive
- NJ TRANSIT Multilevel coaches and cab car
- Amtrak Amfleet coaches and ex-Metroliner cab car
- Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
- True-to-life performance and handling
- Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
- Includes 5 Scenarios and an extensive 24-hour Timetable 
- Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services 
- A selection of Route Tasks to complete 
- Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club 
- Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
